content:
major respect in which the FLO account is superior to accounts that ap-
peal to the concept of person is the explanation the FLO account provides of
the wrongness of killing infants. There was a class of infants who had fu-
tures that included a class of events that were identical to the futures of the
readers of this essay. Thus, reader, the FLO account explains why it was as
wrong to kill you when you were an infant as it is to kill you now. This ac-
count can be generalized to almost all infa
